event_name: dAGI Summit - AI x Web3 | Devcon Bangkok
description:
‚ÄãJoin us for the dAGI Summit 2024 in Bangkok, where visionaries, innovators, and pioneers will gather to explore the powerful convergence of AI and Web3. Together, we will push the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible in building a decentralized, transparent, and equitable future for AGI.

‚ÄãThis is more than just a conference; it‚Äôs a one-day pre-Devcon movement that will unite startups, investors, developers, and forward-thinkers at the forefront of AI and blockchain technology.

dAGI Summit Speakers:
Stepan Gershuni (Cyber*Fund), Arsenii Dain (Gagra Ventures), Nick Havryliak (Assisterr), Chi Zhang (Kyte AI), Alexander Long (Pluralis AI), Prashant Maurya (Spheron), David Minarsch (Olas, Valory), Aleksander Habzibabic (Ora), Evgeny Ponomarev (Fluence), Mario Alves (LayerX), Yan Bo Ng (Filecoin Foundation), Renc Korzay (Giza)
location: The Quarter Chao Phraya by UHG

sessions.name: Welcome Coffee & Networking
sessions.description: Connect with passionate minds over fresh brews and bites ‚òïÔ∏èü•ê

sessions.name: Keynotes & Discussions
sessions.description:
Join top experts from ORA Protocol, Valory and Olas, cyber‚Ä¢Fund, Filecoin, Pluralis.ai, Spheron Network, Assisterr, Gagra Ventures, ZettaBlock, Fluence, and more,
to learn insights on these topics:

- DeAI and the Battle for Control: Politics, Big Tech, and Regulation
- Building Decentralized Compute Network State
- DeAI Infra & Co-Owned AI: Paving the Way for Superior Foundation Models
- Scaling AI with Blockchain and DePIN: New Horizons for Compute and ML Models
- Building AI Together: Decentralized Training & Collaborative Intelligence
- What to build for the post-AGI world?
- The open platform for AI 3.0. Economy: Scaling AI with open access to data and models,
and more to be announced soon!
